name: The OMO System
description:
SUMMARY:

THE OMO SYSTEM IS A FIRST-PERSON SPACE EXPLORATION GAME MADE IN UNITY. YOU PLAY AS A CLONE OF AN ALIEN SPECIES KNOWN AS 'THE GONIX' AND YOUR PURPOSE IS TO EXPLORE THE OMO SYSTEM IN YOUR SPACECRAFT AND LEARN MORE ABOUT IT.

THE OMO SYSTEM IS YOURS TO EXPLORE:

-LEARN ABOUT THE ANCIENT HISTORY OF YOUR RACE AND YOUR CREATORS.  

 -TALK TO OTHER ALIENS AND SEE WHAT'S ON THEIR MINDS. 

-FLY AROUND IN YOUR SPACECRAFT AND VISIT OTHER PLANETS OR STRUCTURES.

-GET INTO COMBAT WITH THE AGGRESSIVE AMORTIS FACTION. 

 -FIND SECRETS AND EASTER EGGS. 

 -PLUS MORE.

VIDEOS:

KEEP IN MIND THE GAMEPLAY CLIPS HERE  ARE FROM DIFFERENT POINTS IN DEVELOPMENT AND CHANGES HAVE BEEN MADE TO CERTAIN THINGS SHOWN + MORE CONTENT HAS BEEN ADDED.

CHECK OUT MY WEBSITE:https://omogonix.weebly.com/the-omo-system.htmlFOLLOW ME ON TWITTER:@omogonix

*PLEASE DO LET ME KNOW IF YOU EXPERIENCE ANY ISSUES IN THE COMMENTS*
